description: A dashboard to help manage Kubernetes cluster costs and resources

panels.content: This dashboard shows monthly cost estimates for the cluster, based on **current** CPU, RAM and storage provisioned.

targets.expr:
sum(
 (
 (
 sum(kube_node_status_capacity_cpu_cores) by (node)
 * on (node) group_left (label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible)
 avg(kube_node_labels{label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible="true"}) by (node)
 ) * $costpcpu
 )
 or
 (
 (
 sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node)
 * on (node) group_left (label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible)
 avg(kube_node_labels{label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible!="true"}) by (node)
 ) * ($costcpu - ($costcpu / 100 * $costDiscount))
 )
)

sum(
 (
 (
 sum(kube_node_status_capacity_memory_bytes) by (node)
 * on (node) group_left (label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible)
 avg(kube_node_labels{label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible="true"}) by (node)
 ) /1024/1024/1024 * $costpram
 )
 or
 (
 (
 sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory", unit="byte"}) by (node)
 * on (node) group_left (label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible)
 avg(kube_node_labels{label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible!="true"}) by (node)
 ) /1024/1024/1024 * ($costram - ($costram / 100 * $costDiscount))
)
)

sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass=~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) or up * 0
) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageSSD

+

sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass!~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) or up * 0
) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageStandard

+ 

sum(container_fs_limit_bytes{id="/"}) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * 1.03 * $costStorageStandard

panels.description: Represents a near worst-case approximation of network costs.
panels.title: Network Egress Cost

panels.description: Current CPU use from applications divided by allocatable CPUs
panels.title: CPU Utilization

panels.description: Current CPU reservation requests from applications vs allocatable CPU
panels.title: CPU Requests

panels.description: Current RAM use vs RAM available
panels.title: RAM Utilization

panels.description: Current RAM requests vs RAM available
panels.title: RAM Requests

panels.description: This gauge shows the current standard storage use, including cluster storage, vs storage available

targets.expr:
sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass!~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
 sum(kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) or up * 0
 + sum(container_fs_usage_bytes{device=~"^/dev/[sv]d[a-z][1-9]$",id="/"})
) /
sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass!~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) or up * 0
 + sum(container_fs_limit_bytes{device=~"^/dev/[sv]d[a-z][1-9]$",id="/"})
) * 100

panels.title: Storage Utilization

panels.description: This gauge shows the current SSD use vs SSD available

targets.expr:
sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass=~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
 sum(kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
) /
sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass=~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
) * 100

panels.title: SSD Utilization

panels.description: Expected monthly cost given current CPU, memory storage, and network resource consumption

targets.expr:
# CPU
sum(
 (
 (
 sum(kube_node_status_capacity_cpu_cores) by (node)
 * on (node) group_left (label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible)
 avg(kube_node_labels{label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible="true"}) by (node)
 ) * $costpcpu
 )
 or
 (
 (
 sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node)
 * on (node) group_left (label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible)
 avg(kube_node_labels{label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible!="true"}) by (node)
 ) * ($costcpu - ($costcpu / 100 * $costDiscount))
 )
) 

+ 

# Storage
sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass=~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) or up * 0
) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageSSD

+

sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass!~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) or up * 0
) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageStandard

+ 

sum(container_fs_limit_bytes{id="/"}) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * 1.03 * $costStorageStandard 

+

# END STORAGE
# RAM 
sum(
 (
 (
 sum(kube_node_status_capacity_memory_bytes) by (node)
 * on (node) group_left (label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible)
 avg(kube_node_labels{label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible="true"}) by (node)
 ) /1024/1024/1024 * $costpram
 )
 or
 (
 (
 sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory", unit="byte"}) by (node)
 * on (node) group_left (label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible)
 avg(kube_node_labels{label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible!="true"}) by (node)
 ) /1024/1024/1024 * ($costram - ($costram / 100 * $costDiscount))
)
)

+

#Network 
SUM(rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{device="eth0"}[60m]) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 ) * (60 * 60 * 24 * 30) * $costEgress

panels.title: Total Monthly Cost

panels.description: Expected monthly CPU, memory and storage costs given provisioned resources

targets.expr:
# CPU
sum(
 (
 (
 sum(kube_node_status_capacity_cpu_cores) by (node)
 * on (node) group_left (label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible)
 avg(kube_node_labels{label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible="true"}) by (node)
 ) * $costpcpu
 )
 or
 (
 (
 sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node)
 * on (node) group_left (label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible)
 avg(kube_node_labels{label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible!="true"}) by (node)
 ) * ($costcpu - ($costcpu / 100 * $costDiscount))
 )
) 

+ 

# Storage
sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass=~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) or up * 0
) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageSSD

+

sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass!~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) or up * 0
) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageStandard

+ 

sum(container_fs_limit_bytes{id="/"}) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * 1.03 * $costStorageStandard 

+

# END STORAGE
# RAM 
sum(
 (
 (
 sum(kube_node_status_capacity_memory_bytes) by (node)
 * on (node) group_left (label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible)
 avg(kube_node_labels{label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible="true"}) by (node)
 ) /1024/1024/1024 * $costpram
 )
 or
 (
 (
 sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory", unit="byte"}) by (node)
 * on (node) group_left (label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible)
 avg(kube_node_labels{label_cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible!="true"}) by (node)
 ) /1024/1024/1024 * ($costram - ($costram / 100 * $costDiscount))
)
) 

+

#Network 
SUM(rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{device="eth0"}[60m]) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 ) * (60 * 60 * 24 * 30) * $costEgress

panels.title: Total monthly cost

panels.description: Resources allocated to namespace based on container requests

targets.expr:
(
 sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", unit="core", namespace!="",namespace!="kube-system",cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible!="true"}*($costcpu - ($costcpu / 100 * $costDiscount))) by(namespace)
 or
 count(
 count(container_spec_cpu_shares{namespace!="",namespace!="kube-system"}) by(namespace)
 ) by(namespace) -1
)

+

(
 sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", unit="core", namespace!="",namespace!="kube-system",cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible="true"}*$costpcpu) by(namespace)
 or
 count(
 count(container_spec_cpu_shares{namespace!="",namespace!="kube-system"}) by(namespace)
 ) by(namespace) -1
)

(
 sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", unit="byte", namespace!="",namespace!="kube-system",cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible!="true"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024*($costram- ($costram / 100 * $costDiscount))) by (namespace) 
 or
 count(
 count(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{namespace!="",namespace!="kube-system"}) by(namespace)
 ) by(namespace) -1
)

+

(
 sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", unit="byte", namespace!="",namespace!="kube-system",cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible="true"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * $costpram ) by (namespace) 
 or
 count(
 count(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{namespace!="",namespace!="kube-system"}) by(namespace)
 ) by(namespace) -1
)

sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass=~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) 
) by (namespace) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageSSD 

or

sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass!~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) 
) by (namespace) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageStandard

# CPU 
(
 sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", unit="core", namespace!="",namespace!="kube-system",cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible!="true"}*($costcpu - ($costcpu / 100 * $costDiscount))) by(namespace)
 or
 count(
 count(container_spec_cpu_shares{namespace!="",namespace!="kube-system"}) by(namespace)
 ) by(namespace) -1
)

+

(
 sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu", unit="core", namespace!="",namespace!="kube-system",cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible="true"}*$costpcpu) by(namespace)
 or
 count(
 count(container_spec_cpu_shares{namespace!="",namespace!="kube-system"}) by(namespace)
 ) by(namespace) -1
)

+

#END CPU 
# Memory 

(
 sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", unit="byte", namespace!="",namespace!="kube-system",cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible!="true"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024*($costram- ($costram / 100 * $costDiscount))) by (namespace) 
 or
 count(
 count(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{namespace!="",namespace!="kube-system"}) by(namespace)
 ) by(namespace) -1
)

+

(
 sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory", unit="byte", namespace!="",namespace!="kube-system",cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible="true"} / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * $costpram ) by (namespace) 
 or
 count(
 count(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{namespace!="",namespace!="kube-system"}) by(namespace)
 ) by(namespace) -1
)

+

# PV storage

(
sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass=~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) 
) by (namespace) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageSSD 

or

sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass!~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
 + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) 
) by (namespace) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageStandard 
)

panels.title: Namespace cost allocation

panels.description: This table shows the comparison of CPU requests and usage by namespace
panels.title: CPU request utilization by namespace

panels.description: This table shows the comparison of application CPU usage vs the capacity of the node (measured over last 60 minutes)

targets.expr:
SUM(
SUM(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total[24h])) by (pod_name)
* on (pod_name) group_left (node) 
label_replace(
 avg(kube_pod_info{}),
 "pod_name", 
 "$1", 
 "pod", 
 "(.+)"
)
) by (node) 
/ 
sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"}) by (node)

panels.title: Cluster cost & utilization by node

panels.description: Comparison of memory requests and current usage by namespace
panels.title: Memory requests & utilization by namespace

panels.description: Container RAM usage vs node capacity
panels.title: Node utilization of allocatable RAM

targets.expr:
sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass=~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
 * on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes{storageclass=~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
) by (namespace,persistentvolumeclaim,storageclass) / 1024 / 1024 /1024

or

sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass!~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
 * on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes{storageclass!~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
) by (namespace,persistentvolumeclaim,storageclass) / 1024 / 1024 /1024

sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass=~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
 * on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes{storageclass=~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
) by (namespace,persistentvolumeclaim,storageclass) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageSSD

or

sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass!~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
 * on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes{storageclass!~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
) by (namespace,persistentvolumeclaim,storageclass) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageStandard

sum(kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) 
/
sum (
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass!~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
 * on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
 sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes{storageclass!~".*ssd.*"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
) by (namespace,persistentvolumeclaim)

title: Cluster cost & utilization metrics
